comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps Senor Jose Lopez Portillo y Rojas, who would have been Mexican Minister of Foreign Affairs on April 16, 1914 (the date written on the negative). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_L%C3%B3pez_Portillo_y_Rojas is a very brief Wikipedia page on him. www.biografiasyvidas.com/biografia/l/lopez_portillo_y_roj... (in Spanish) is more substantial and has a photo of the same man when younger.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Swang: Thanks for the information about Portillo. This listing of 20th century Mexican foreign ministers has another photo of him, which confirms his identity: www.sre.gob.mx/acerca/secretarios/xx.html (scroll down to 1914). We will add some of this information to the image description when we update.
